import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import axios from "axios" import {Router} from "@reach/router" import './App.css'; import ProductList from "./components/ProductList" import Detail from "./components/Detail" function App() { const [products, setProducts] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get("http://localhost:8000/product-list/") .then((res) => setProducts(res.data)) .catch(err => console.log(err)) console.log(products) }, []) return (

Products

{products.map((product) => ( //Going to remove this styling portion, this is for show
{/* */}

Name: {product.name}

Description: {product.desc}

Category: {product.atype}

Price: {product.price}

Quantity: {product.quantity}

Rating: {product.rating}

))}

_________________________________________________________________________________________________________

{/* */}
); } export default App;
